Sentencas: Co-doped samples of electrolytes (Ce1-x-ySmxYbyO2-delta (x = y = 0.05,0.1), have been prepared by Sol- gel method and characterized to explore their use as a solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The crystal structure, microstructure, and ionic conductivity have been determined by X-ray diffraction (XRD), Scanning electron microscopy (SEM), Energy dispersive X-ray spectrometer (EDX), Raman Spectroscopy (Raman), and impedance spectroscopy respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The XRD result reveals that all the samples are single phase with cubic fluorite-type structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The relative densities of samples sintered at1400 degrees C are about 96% of theoretical densities confirming their use as an electrolyte for IT- SOFC applications.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The SEM micrograph confirmed formation of dean grains with distinct grain boundaries.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The results of the Raman spectrum showed the formation of oxygen vacancies in YbSDC-samples which are responsible for the diffusion of oxygen ions in the lattice.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Based on the impedance spectroscopy analysis, the conductivity of compositions Ce0.9Sm0.05Yb0.05O1.95, Ce0.85Sm0.05Yb0.1O1.925, Ce0.85SM0.1Yb0.05O1.925 and Ce0.8Sm0.1Yb0.1O1.9 found are 1.88 x 10(-3) S/cm, 4.4 x 10(-3) S/cm, 7.0 x 10(-3) S/cm and 6.59 x 10(-3) S/cm respectively at 500 degrees C in air atmosphere.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Moreover, the composition Ce0.85Sm0.1Yb0.05O1.925 showed the highest ionic conductivities and least activation energies at all measuring temperatures than other samples in YbSDC-series.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: All the results have shown that Yb and Sm co-doped ceria are promising electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ytterbium and Samarium Co-doped ceria as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell application
